title: RadicalxChange
description: Joining artists, entrepreneurs and scholars to heal political divides and inequality through political and economic mechanism design.
keywords: event, RadicalxChange, RxC, radical, exchange, political, uprooting, capitalism, democracy, artists, entrepreneurs, scholars, COST, QV
newVersionAvailable: A new version of this app is available.

howItWas.description: Described by many as 'Google I/O of Ukraine', our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere.
howItWas.label: See how it was in 2016

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets are non-transferable. Prices will increase for General Admission 2. For complete information on tickets and scholarships, please see our About page.

form.title: If you send us your details, we will reach out about becoming a partner or donor.

callToAction.label: View all news on our blog

galleryBlock.title: #dfua16 highlights
galleryBlock.description: This year's festival built lots of excitement. Check out photos from featured talks, hands-on learning sessions, and after-hours fun.

callToAction.text: Interested in staying engaged with our community? Subscribe here for updates.
callToAction.label: Subscribe

subscribeBlock.formTitle: Get the latest updates, insights and news about RadicalxChange in your inbox.
subscribeBlock.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address.
subscribeBlock.generalError: We're awfully sorry. An error has occured. Please try again later.

team.description: We're a volunteer-driven community united by our vision for building more efficient and egalitarian societies.

notifications.enabled: We will miss you but you can unsubscribe anytime
notifications.blocked: We can't send you notifications right now. Please enable notifications in your browser

blocks.title: Organizer
blocks.description: GDG Lviv with support of 10 GDGs from all around Ukraine is proud organizer of DevFest Ukraine

blocks.title: What is GDG?
blocks.description: Google Developers Group (GDG) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
